Organization.address: Downing Site, Cambridge, Cambridge, CB2 3EH, United Kingdom
Organization.name: University of Cambridge

Description.text: FlyBase controlled vocabularies for developmental stages.

Protocol.text: Groups of 100 prepupae were collected from bottles every 30 min and frozen directly in liquid N2. Frozen samples were pooled and ground to a powder in liquid N2 before resuspension in TRIZOL.
Protocol.name: P10005_sample

Protocol.text: Drosophila were grown in an incubator at a temperature of 25C and 50% humidity.
Protocol.name: DROSOPHILA_GROWTH
FC_EXTRACTION_02
Protocol.text: Small Scale Extraction of Total RNA

Protocol.name: FC_Transformation_01
Protocol.text: The data was analysed using ArrayPro Analyzer
